dubai_men_40_exec.name: Dubai Men 40+ (Executive)
dubai_men_40_exec.pain_points: Stress belly, low energy, losing competitive edge, 'no time'.
dubai_men_40_exec.desires: Peak performance, boardroom dominance, status, respect.
dubai_men_40_exec.language: Need my edge back, 6AM Sessions, Executive Protocol

dubai_men_50_health.name: Dubai Men 50+ (Family/Health Focus)
dubai_men_50_health.pain_points: Health scares (pre-diabetes, high cholesterol), joint pain, medication dependency, fear of 'slowing down'.
dubai_men_50_health.desires: Longevity, strength for family (play with grandkids), get off meds, be a 'strong Jiddo'.
dubai_men_50_health.language: Stay strong for my family, Doctor said it's my age, Medical-Grade

abu_dhabi_women_40_family.name: Abu Dhabi Women 40+ (Cultural/Family)
abu_dhabi_women_40_family.pain_points: 'Mummy tummy', traditional food weight, cultural barriers, 'lost spark', 'no time with kids'.
abu_dhabi_women_40_family.desires: Feel modern and healthy, set example for daughters, 'make him notice you again'.
abu_dhabi_women_40_family.language: 100% Female Team, Cultural Respect, Private Sessions, Need husband's approval

abu_dhabi_women_50_social.name: Abu Dhabi Women 50+ (Hormonal/Social)
abu_dhabi_women_50_social.pain_points: Menopause weight gain, hormonal chaos, stress eating, 'feeling invisible'.
abu_dhabi_women_50_social.desires: Fit elegant gowns, 'feel like yourself again', beat menopause, maintain social standing.
abu_dhabi_women_50_social.language: Menopause Mastery, Fix hormones, Elegant, Discreet
